Info.Description: Socipedia Django Backend API with automatic image compression
Info.Features: JWT Auth, CRUD operations, Image compression (Profile: 800x800px@85%, Posts: 1200x1200px@80%), CORS support
Info.Image Compression: All uploaded images are automatically compressed - Profile pictures: max 800x800px at 85% quality, Post images: max 1200x1200px at 80% quality

Auth.Register with Image: curl -X POST http://localhost:8000/api/register/ -F "username=testuser" -F "password=testpassword" -F "email=test@example.com" -F "first_name=Test" -F "last_name=User" -F "picture=@/path/to/your/image.jpg" # Image auto-compressed to 800x800px@85%

Users.Update User (Basic Fields): curl -X PATCH http://localhost:8000/api/users/4/ -H "Authorization: Bearer <your_access_token>" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"first_name": "Updated", "location": "New Location"}'
Users.Update User (All Text Fields): curl -X PATCH http://localhost:8000/api/users/4/ -H "Authorization: Bearer <your_access_token>" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"first_name": "Updated", "last_name": "NewLastName", "email": "newemail@example.com", "username": "newusername", "location": "New Location", "occupation": "Developer"}'
Users.Update User with Picture: curl -X PATCH http://localhost:8000/api/users/4/ -H "Authorization: Bearer <your_access_token>" -F "first_name=Updated" -F "location=New Location" -F "picture=@/path/to/your/image.jpg" # Image auto-compressed to 800x800px@85%

Posts.Create Post: curl -X POST http://localhost:8000/api/posts/ -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "Authorization: Bearer <your_access_token>" -d '{"description": "This is a test post"}'
Posts.Create Post with Image: curl -X POST http://localhost:8000/api/posts/ -H "Authorization: Bearer <your_access_token>" -F "description=This is a test post with image" -F "picture=@/path/to/your/image.jpg" # Auto-compressed to 1200x1200px@80%
Posts.Update Post Description (Standard PATCH): curl -X PATCH http://localhost:8000/api/posts/1/ -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "Authorization: Bearer <your_access_token>" -d '{"description": "This is an updated post description"}'
Posts.Update Post with Image (Standard PATCH): curl -X PATCH http://localhost:8000/api/posts/1/ -H "Authorization: Bearer <your_access_token>" -F "description=Updated post with new image" -F "picture=@/path/to/your/new_image.jpg"
Posts.Update Post (Custom PATCH Action): curl -X PATCH http://localhost:8000/api/posts/1/update_post/ -H "Authorization: Bearer <your_access_token>" -F "description=Updated via custom action" -F "picture=@/path/to/your/image.jpg"

Comments.Create Comment: curl -X POST http://localhost:8000/api/comments/ -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "Authorization: Bearer <your_access_token>" -d '{"post_id": 1, "comment": "This is a test comment"}'
Comments.Update Comment: curl -X PATCH http://localhost:8000/api/comments/1/ -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "Authorization: Bearer <your_access_token>" -d '{"comment": "This is an updated comment"}'
